name: United Spaceforce
description:
Space Invaders meet trivia and history of space flight.

Kill the enemy alien spaceships before they kill you or enter Earths' atmosphere (the bottom of the screen)

Get upgrades with help from different nations, provided you choose the right answer!

If people like playing it, I will introduce more levels and more/better AI enemy space ships.

What is your high score? :-)

--

Game is my first ever published game, and submitted for Weekly Game Jam 270, themed "Cultural Exchange" - a lot of improvements and a few bugs corrections outstanding.

NOTE: Current version 0.0000001 has a bug, when returning to the main menu. Until corrected please just play game from one level to the next. If you want to play again, please reload the page.

--

Planned developments:

  • Displaying the correct answer, after the quiz was taken.
  • Writing an outcome/answer for each of the quiz options instead of just right/wrong as of now.
  • Additional kinds of enemies, better AI
  • Additional types of upgrades (i.e. Shield)
  • Improve background/graphics to make it more interesting
  • Add music
  • Create more quizzes and levels if people play it

Bug fixing:

  • Ensure proper flow of game dialogues after restart (ensure game-state handling can only be called once)
